LWSlider Class Reference

#include <ASlider.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Lightweight version of ASlider. In other words it does not have a window permanaently associated with it.

Public Member Functions

 LWSlider (wxWindow *parent, wxString name, const wxPoint &pos, const wxSize &size, float minValue, float maxValue, float stepValue, bool canUseShift, int style, bool heavyweight=false, bool popup=true)
